# 代码块

代码块语法: https://vuepress.vuejs.org/zh/guide/markdown (opens new window)

 


 

 
 





export default { // Highlighted
  data () {
    return {
      msg: `Highlighted!
      This line isn't highlighted,
      but this and the next 2 are.`,
      motd: 'VuePress is awesome',
      lorem: 'ipsum',
    }
  }
}
